snippet.title: Phantom Rose - Trailer / Indie Game 2019
snippet.description: Phantom Rose is a roguelike deckbuilding card game. Play as Reina, a maid in search of her lost master in a mansion now ravaged by evil creatures. Build a deck of spell cards to defeat the phantoms and make careful decisions while you explore as each death is permanent.
